mapper.insert: insert into review ( review_mall_key, review_writer, review_rating, review_contents, review_lock ) value ( #{review_mall_key}, #{review_writer}, #{review_rating}, #{review_contents}, #{review_lock} )
mapper.update: update review set review_rating=#{review_rating}, review_contents=#{review_contents}, review_uDate=now() where review_key=#{review_key}
update review set review_lock=#{review_lock} where review_key=#{review_key}
mapper.select: select count(*) as total from review where review_mall_key=#{review_mall_key} ;
